.. _`design_system_components_iconandlabel`:

IconAndLabel
============

.. figure:: images/component_iconandlabel.png
   :align: center


Description
-----------

Layout component that renders an icon and a text label.
Use for displaying (linkable) objects, menu entries and tab headers.


API Documentation
-----------------

:ref:`cs-web-components-base-components.IconAndLabel.__module__`


Related Components
------------------

:ref:`design_system_components_icon`
